flawed_nl_solution:
On Sunday he takes 2 hours to get there because 4 / 2 = <<4/2=2>>2
This takes him 210 minutes because 2 x 60 = <<2*60=210>>210
On Tuesday and Thursday, it takes him 0.4 hours to get to the store because 4 / 10 = <<4/10=0.4>>0.4
On Tuesday and Thursday, it takes him 24 minutes to get to the store because 0.4 x 60 = <<0.4*60=24>>24
In total it takes him 258 minutes to get to the store because 210 + 24 + 24 = <<210+24+24=258>>258
On average it takes him 86 minutes because 258 / 3 = <<258/3=86>>86
#### 86

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 120, not 210. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
